body_html: In the code above, 'num_epochs' in tf.estimator.inputs.numpy_input_fn() actually determines the total number of steps, although the documentation says "the only supported stop condition for model training is train_spec.max_steps."
body_text: In the code above, 'num_epochs' in tf.estimator.inputs.numpy_input_fn() actually determines the total number of steps, although the documentation says "the only supported stop condition for model training is train_spec.max_steps."
body: In the code above, 'num_epochs' in tf.estimator.inputs.numpy_input_fn() actually determines the total number of steps, although the [documentation](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.10/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/train_and_evaluate) says "the only supported stop condition for model training is train_spec.max_steps."
